com.percussion.services.content.data
Class PSItemStatus

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.services.content.data.PSItemStatus

public class PSItemStatus
extends Object

This object represents a single item status at the time it was prepared for edit. This object may be used to release the item later.

Constructor Summary

          Creates an instance with the specified id of a item.

PSItemStatus

public PSItemStatus(int contentId)
Creates an instance with the specified id of a item.

Parameters:
contentId - the id of the item.

PSItemStatus

public PSItemStatus(int contentId,
                    boolean didCheckout,
                    boolean didTransition,
                    Long fromStateId,
                    String fromState,
                    Long toStateId,
                    String toState)
Creates an instance from the specified parameters.

Parameters:
contentId - the id of the item, may not be null.
didCheckout - true if the item was, false otherwise. see isDidCheckout() for more info.
didTransition - true if the item was, false otherwise. see isDidTransition() for more info.
fromStateId - the id of the from-state, see getFromStateId() for more info. It may be null.
fromState - the name of the from-state, see getFromState() for more info. It may be null or empty.
toStateId - the id of the to-state, see getToStateId() for more info. It may be null.
toState - the name of the to-state, see getToState() for more info. It may be null or empty.

Was the item checked out to prepare it for edit?

Returns:

getFromState

public String getFromState()
Get the name of the workflow state in which the item was before it was prepared for edit. This is only available if the item had to be transitioned to bring it into edit mode.

Returns:
the item state before it was prepared for edit, may be null, never empty.

setFromState

public void setFromState(String fromState)
Set the name of the workflow state in which the item was before it was prepared for edit.

Parameters:
fromState - the new item state before it was prepared for edit, may be null, not empty.

getToState

public String getToState()
Get the name of the workflow state to which the item was transitioned to prepare it for edit. This is only available if the item had to be transitioned to bring it into edit mode.

Returns:
the item state to which the it was transitioned to prepared it for edit, may be null, never empty.

setToState

public void setToState(String toState)
Set the name of the workflow state to which the item was transitioned to prepare it for edit.

Parameters:
toState - the new item state to which the it was transitioned to prepared it for edit, may be null, not empty.

getFromStateId

public Long getFromStateId()
Get the id of the workflow state in which the item was before it was prepared for edit. This is only available if the item had to be transitioned to bring it into edit mode.

Returns:
the state id described above, may be null.

setFromStateId

public void setFromStateId(Long fromStateId)
Set the id of the workflow state in which the item was before it was prepared for edit.

Parameters:
fromStateId - the id of new item state before it was prepared for edit, may be null.

getToStateId

public Long getToStateId()
Get the id of the workflow state to which the item was transitioned to prepare it for edit. This is only available if the item had to be transitioned to bring it into edit mode.

Returns:
the state id to which the item was transitioned to prepared it for edit, may be null.

setToStateId

Set the id of the workflow state to which the item was transitioned to prepare it for edit.

Parameters:
toStateId - the new state id to which the item was transitioned to prepared it for edit, may be null.
